00026 class Color {
00027 
00028 public:
00029 
00030   Color( const unsigned int rgb, unsigned char alpha = 255 );
00031 
00032   Color( unsigned char redValue, unsigned char  greenValue, unsigned char  blueValue,
00033          unsigned char alphaValue = 255 )
00034     : _red(redValue),_green(greenValue),_blue(blueValue),_alpha(alphaValue) { }
00035 
00036   Color( unsigned char grayValue, unsigned char alphaValue = 255 )
00037     : _red(grayValue),_green(grayValue),_blue(grayValue),_alpha(alphaValue) { }
00038 
00039   Color( const bool validColor = true )
00040     : _red(-1),_green(-1),_blue(-1),_alpha(255)
00041   { 
00042     if ( validColor ) {
00043       _red = _green = _blue = 0;
00044     }
00045   }
00046       
00047   inline void red( unsigned char red );
00048   inline void green( unsigned char green );
00049   inline void blue( unsigned char blue );
00050   inline void alpha( unsigned char alpha );
00051

00053   inline unsigned char green() const;
00054   inline unsigned char blue() const;
00055   inline unsigned char alpha() const;

00058                           const unsigned char green,
00059                           const unsigned char blue,
00060                           const unsigned char alpha = 255 );

00063                    float green,

00065                    float alpha = 1.0 );

00076

00087   std::string postscript() const;
00088   
00089   inline bool valid() const { return (*this) != Color::None; }
00090

00115 inline Color &
00116 Color::setRGBi( const unsigned char redValue,
00117                 const unsigned char greenValue,
00118                 const unsigned char blueValue,
00119                 const unsigned char alphaValue ) {
00120   _red = redValue;
00121   _green = greenValue;
00122   _blue = blueValue;
00123   _alpha = alphaValue;
00124   return *this;
00125 }
